name: Saint Confessor David
summary: Chariton the Confessor was an early Christian monk. He is venerated as a saint by both the Western and Eastern Churches.
biography: Chariton the Confessor was an early Christian monk. He is venerated as a saint by both the Western and Eastern Churches. His remembrance day is September 28.
